data.text:
@SenatorHassan Senator, history is watching. Silence in the face of #IranMassacare speaks volumes. Iranians are demanding freedom and accountability:
The Iranian people NEED strong, targeted military support. Over 43,000 lives lost in just 48 hours, with thousands more facing execution.
@SenatorHassan Always inspiring to see athletes representing their home states on the world stage. Wishing Team USA a strong and successful showing in Milan.

@SenatorHassan US Democrats run 3rd world cities. I wasn't ever interested in Cities. What a sight.

https://t.co/46yzIziY1Z

@SenatorHassan Of course. Look at this weenie. He says no talking anymore because we (probably me) says something harsh. My feelings are hurting.

https://t.co/hsHsRuV3jW
@SenatorHassan Oh and please do not shut down our government. We’d like them to be able to return home.
@SenatorHassan I emailed you yesterday and am waiting for your response! Please endorse the SAVE Act.
